bropals.lib.simplegame.math

Class Vector2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.math.Vector2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Vector2DCapped

    public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A Vector with 2 components to it. All the components are stored as floats, despite the getter and setter methods taking doubles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector2D()
      Make a new [0, 0] Vector.
      Vector2D(double x, double y)
      Make a new Vector with the given initial values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2D add(Vector2D other)
      Make a new vector that is the sum of this and a given vector.
      void addLocal(Vector2D other)
      Add the given vector to this vector.
      float dot(Vector2D other)
      Returns the dot product between this vector and another vector.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object other) 
      float getX()
      Returns the vector's x component
      float getY()
      Returns the vector's y component
      float magnitude()
      Returns the magnitude (length) of the vector.
      float magnitudeSquared()
      Returns the magnitude squared of the vector.
      Vector2D normalize()
      Return a new vector whose magnitude is 1 and direction is the same.
      void normalizeLocal()
      Normalize this vector, making it's magnitude 1 and the direction unchanged.
      Vector2D scale(double factor)
      Make a new vector that is a copy of this vector but scaled.
      void scaleLocal(double factor)
      Scale this vector by the given factor.
      void setValues(double x, double y)
      Set both values of the Vector.

      Sets the vector's x component
      void setY(double y)
      Sets the vector's y component
